text: @elonmusk A quote from "Dune"?!  That's all u got?  U may b smart but where's your medical degree from?  Downplaying COVID-19 is foolish & dangerous but I'm sure Trump is grateful 4 your service.  Put the bong down. #COVID19 #SendWorkersHome #TrumpPandemic
